feels.name: Love
feels.quote: You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.

feels.name: Resentment
feels.quote: She lost all compassion in anger.

feels.name: Shame
feels.quote: I perfectly comprehend your feelings, and have now only to be ashamed of what my own have been.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: She tried, however, to compose herself to answer him with patience, when he should have done.

feels.name: Pity
feels.quote: Soon overcame the pity which the consideration of his attachment had for a moment excited.

feels.name: Astonishment
feels.quote: Her astonishment, as she reflected on what had passed, was increased by every review of it.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Mr. Darcy expresses his love for Elizabeth.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Elizabeth loses compassion in anger towards Mr. Darcy.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Mr. Darcy feels ashamed of his actions towards Elizabeth.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Elizabeth tries to compose herself in response to Mr. Darcy's language.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Elizabeth's pity for Mr. Darcy is overcome by his actions.

Places.name: Parsonage
Places.description: Location where Elizabeth reflects on Mr. Darcy's proposal with astonishment.
